div.p: Wynot Public Schools will be offering the delivery of school lunches to all Wynot students and their family members ages 0-18. Please fill out the appropriate form below DAILY by 9AM the DAY BEFORE of the lunch you are requesting. (Example: to order food for Tuesday, you need to fill out this form no later than Monday at 9AM) This program is free to participate in and will follow our normal school calendar (if the . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about ORDER SCHOOL LUNCHES HERE!

div.p:
Below you'll find a link to episode #5 of The Wynot Way! On this episode we discuss our schools Makerspace Lab!
https://www.buzzsprout.com/859084/3401518-the-wynot-makerspace

a.aria-label: Read more about Check Out Our Latest Podcast!

h3.a: School Closed For The Remainder of the Year

div.p: Based on regulations from Governor Rickets, Wynot Public Schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. We will however continue to meet the needs of our students through packets and virtual learning opportunities such as Zoom and Google Classroom. We understand this decision places hardships on families, but it is truly to keep everyone as healthy as possible.

a.aria-label: Read more about School Closed For The Remainder of the Year

h3.a: What Students Can Expect Moving Forward....

div.p:
Students and Parents –
I want to thank each and every one of you for being so amazing during this very hard time. You can’t know how much your teachers miss you and wish we were able to be together in our school building. However, based on the situation we are facing, we know that is not a possibility. It is challenging and difficult not to be able to finish our year in the . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about What Students Can Expect Moving Forward....
